title: Chevrolet Corvair Convertible
item_description:
Chevrolet Corvair Convertible

  • VIN: None found
  • License: NSM236
    • Per DMV, no record found
  • Odometer Reads: 93896
  • Key: Not Available

Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of removal of this lot. No loading assistance or assistance of any kind will be provided by West Auctions. Please bid accordingly.

Note:Â  This item is being sold on behalf of an estate to clear off of the property. This item either had one of the following categories; 1) No identification was found on the frame, or 2). The ID or license plate found was verified with the California DMV where no record was found. Therefore the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed 1-2 weeks after removal. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.
